statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT city, state, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers, country FROM customers GROUP BY country HAVING total_customers > 2;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, country FROM customers WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT city, state FROM customers ORDER BY state, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_order_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, products_purchased FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, order_date, total_order_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, SUM(total_order_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, first_name, last_name HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(products_purchased) AS product FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE product = 'Laptop';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT cohort_name, cohort_start_date, cohort_end_date FROM cohort_analysis;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT cohort_name, cohort_start_date, cohort_end_date FROM cohorts WHERE cohort_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, product_id FROM purchases WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE signup_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, signup_date FROM customers ORDER BY signup_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 5
SELECT cohort_id, cohort_name, COUNT(*) AS num_customers FROM cohorts JOIN customers ON cohorts.cohort_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY cohort_id
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, product_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM cohort_analysis;
SELECT customer_id, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis ORDER BY cohort_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_details ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT cohort_id, cohort_date FROM cohort_analysis;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_details ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_timestamp <= '2022-03-31';
